text: "Can't You Hear Me Knocking" is a 1971 song by The Rolling Stones and is the fourth track from their album Sticky Fingers. The track is over seven minutes long and has a bit of blues rock, hard rock and jazz rock thrown into it. Category:1971 songs Category:The Rolling Stones songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Songs about drugs
title: Can't You Hear Me Knocking
